statements.statement: SELECT TP.LINE_CD "lineCd", TP.LINE_CD || ':' || LM.LINE_SHORT_NM "lineNm" FROM TM_PW_TRC_PROCESS TP LEFT OUTER JOIN TM_CC_LINE LM ON TP.LINE_CD = LM.LINE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TM_PW_TRC_PROCESS_CLASS TPC ON TP.LINE_CD = TPC.LINE_CD AND TP.PROCESS_CD = TPC.PROCESS_CD WHERE TP.TRC_DISPLAY_FLG = 1 AND TPC.GENERAL_PATTERN_CD = #productKnd# AND SYSDATE BETWEEN LM.APPLY_START_DT AND LM.APPLY_END_DT GROUP BY TP.LINE_CD, LM.LINE_SHORT_NM, LM.DISPLAY_ORDER4 ORDER BY LM.DISPLAY_ORDER4

SELECT TP.LINE_CD "lineCd", TP.LINE_CD || ':' || LM.LINE_SHORT_NM "lineNm", TP.PROCESS_CD "processCd", TP.PROCESS_NM "processNm", TP.SEARCH_TARGET_FLG "searchTargetFlg", TW.WORK_CD "workCd", TW.WORK_NM "workNm" FROM TM_PW_TRC_PROCESS TP LEFT OUTER JOIN TM_CC_LINE LM ON TP.LINE_CD = LM.LINE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TM_PW_TRC_WORK TW ON TP.LINE_CD = TW.LINE_CD AND TP.PROCESS_CD = TW.PROCESS_CD WHERE TP.TRC_DISPLAY_FLG = 1 AND SYSDATE BETWEEN LM.APPLY_START_DT AND LM.APPLY_END_DT
TP.LINE_CD = #lineCd#
UPPER(PROCESS_NM) LIKE UPPER('%' || #processNm# || '%')
UPPER(WORK_NM) LIKE UPPER('%' || #workNm# || '%')
ORDER BY TP.DISPLAY_ODR, TW.DISPLAY_ODR
